Colin Powell , former secretary of state in the Bush administration who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said the Bill Clinton was well positioned politically. He hasn't achieved all of his purposes, but he's stabilised the economy. The economy is now starting to rebound, more slowly than we would like to see, but it is rebounding, he told CNN.`` Whether you approve of healthcare or not, he took on that issue, which I think is a major challenge for the American people.''
